item.title: About me
item.author: alexandersaaf95@gmail.com (Alexander Sääf)
item.description: Hey! Welcome to my small corner of this gigantic web of connections that we call the internet. It’s not a very large corner, but it’s where I hang out, and I kinda like it here. I hope you will too. I am a software development student from Sweden, and I spend my spare time developing videogames, currently with Unity. I am right now developing a platformer game for mobile called ‘Super Platformer’, which is currently in beta.

item.title: My projects
item.author: alexandersaaf95@gmail.com (Alexander Sääf)
item.description: This is a port of the HPSTR theme to Hugo. All the original features are intact and described below. Credit for the theme goes entirely to Michael Rose. They say three times the charm, so here is another free responsive Jekyll blog theme for you. I’ve learned a ton since open sourcing my first two themes on Github, and wanted to try a few new things this time around.
